x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Organizations often struggle to systematically monitor employee wellness, stress levels, and engagement. Without real-time insights, it’s hard to detect burnout or disengagement early, which can lead to reduced productivity, higher absenteeism, and increased employee turnover.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

  • HR Service Delivery – Case management, employee engagement.
  • Surveys – Collect feedback efficiently.
  • Service Portal – User-friendly interface for employees.
  • Dashboards & Reporting – Visualize trends and insights.
  • Notifications – Alerts or reminders for follow-ups.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

  • Secure handling of anonymous data.
  • Access to HR Service Delivery module.
  • Optional: integration with existing HR or wellness tools.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

  • Ensuring data privacy and anonymity while providing useful insights.
  • Encouraging employee adoption and engagement with surveys.
  • Balancing actionable alerts with avoiding alert fatigue for managers.
  • Designing scalable dashboards for large organizations.
